verses.roman:
tatas ta ṛṣayaḥ kṣattaḥ
kṛta-dārā nimantrya tam
prātiṣṭhan nandim āpannāḥ
svaṁ svam āśrama-maṇḍalam

synonyms: tataḥ—then; te—they; ṛṣayaḥ—the sages; kṣattaḥ—O Vidura; kṛta-dārāḥ—thus married; nimantrya—taking leave of; tam—Kardama; prātiṣṭhan—they departed; nandim—joy; āpannāḥ—obtained; svam svam—each to his own; āśrama-maṇḍalam—hermitage.
translation: Thus married, the sages took leave of Kardama and departed full of joy, each for his own hermitage, O Vidura.
